title: Drawing, "Project for the elevation of a vase on an octagonal pedestal", 1827–35
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash on paper
signed: Signed in reddish ink, lower right: J. Seethaler del.
inscribed: Inscribed in reddish ink, lower right: N. 11
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Sphinxes project from the oblique sides of the pedestal which shows farther up a palmette fringe. Satyr masks and a grapevine festoon decorate the concave top section of the vase.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for the elevation of a vase on an octagonal pedestal", 1827–35.
1827–35. Pen and black ink, brush and wash on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-336.
